https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/romm4v4wZ5sIid55XxuMwdaPs8I.jpg Carlos is a ten-year-old boy who doesn't hear usual sounds in a normal way. Now, his parents have to decide if he should grow up as a normal boy or as a special one. A Minor Inconvenience
